title: Discovery Call with Johnson Corp
description: Initial discovery call to understand their current challenges and requirements for the software solution.
notes: Prepared agenda: current processes, pain points, budget discussion, timeline requirements

title: Product Demo for TechStart Solutions
description: Comprehensive product demonstration showcasing key features and integration capabilities.
notes: Demo environment prepared, focus on integration features and scalability

title: Follow-up Email to Sarah Davis
description: Send follow-up email with proposal details and next steps after yesterday's meeting.
notes: Include: proposal attachment, implementation timeline, pricing breakdown, next meeting options
outcome: Email sent successfully. Sarah responded with questions about training and support.

title: Contract Review Meeting
description: Internal meeting to review contract terms and legal requirements for Global Industries deal.
notes: Agenda: liability clauses, payment terms, delivery milestones, support agreements

title: Site Visit to InnovateCorp
description: On-site visit to assess their current infrastructure and implementation requirements.
notes: Bring: technical specifications, integration checklist, network requirements documentation

title: Quarterly Check-in Call
description: Regular quarterly business review call with NextGen Systems to discuss performance and upcoming needs.
notes: Review: usage metrics, ROI analysis, satisfaction survey, renewal discussion

title: Proposal Follow-up Call with Maria Rodriguez
description: Follow-up call to discuss proposal feedback and address any concerns or questions.
notes: Topics: budget concerns, implementation timeline, training requirements, competitor comparison
